body: Bro.. Why you turning into Hoe

Gender Bender sounds a lot more cooler, rolls off the tongue yk. Also out of all GB doujins I've read, only a few of em had "body swap".  And thank you for sharing this information. @Schmiddisen
bro to hoe

Nhentai doujins are originally from e-hentai.org. On e-hentai.org, "gender bender" was changed to "gender change" due to "gender bender" used to be mutually exclusive with "body swap", which used to be very confusing. In addition, many people dislike "gender bender" doujin with elemets such as possession and bodyswap The tag "gender morph" is now a seperate one for only transformation from male to female and vice versa. Copy this comment to every hentai if anyone ask this question. Original forum thread: https://forums.e-hentai.org/index.php?showtopic=253088
Only problem is that there's not enough.

@TacticalWatergun I agree. "Gender Change" and "Gender Morph" are stupid and irrelevant. "Gender Bender" is a catch all and covers them nicely. Now, the method of the change may be a gripe for some, but that's handled pretty well by other related tags. ie: Transformation, Corruption, Skinsuit, Body Swap, Possession, etc. The only further clarification I can think of that *could* be warranted might be on the direction of the change, ie: MtF, FtM; but that seems more niche than anything at this point. In other words..... DONT FIX WHAT AINT BROKEN GUYS.
It's not gay if there's a Scabbard to Sheath our Swords into
@Rello I agree with ya. Even Gender Bender is in the title. The fuck are these guys smokin' to mess with the designation tag for GB. It's always been Gender Bender for years. Let's keep it that way.
What's with the tags? Why use redundant, rarely used tags like "gender morph" and "gender change" when they both apparently mean the same thing as the "gender bender" tag that has 9000+ results?
